kaapi_frame.h File Reference

Classes

class  RFO::Frame
 Frame is a list of ordered closure.The frame correspond to an activation frame associated to each evaluation of closure, i.e. a call to function. A frame stores the list of created closures using the order of creation. Each newly created closure is added into the back side of the list, while they are consumed in the front side (FIFO queue). Frames are order into a stack. More...

Namespaces

namespace  RFO
 

Basic class to allows the definition of reference order execution.
